metadata.name: Pondverse Egg.
metadata.description:
The Pondverse egg NFT is the cornerstone of an immersive and captivating ecosystem that invites collectors to embark on a thrilling journey of discovery and evolution. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail and featuring stunning animated artwork, this NFT represents the first step in a dynamic and engaging storyline that unfolds over 55 days. With each subsequent burn, collectors will experience the thrill of progress and the excitement of discovering new twists and surprises in the evolving narrative.

As the starting point of the Pondverse journey, the egg NFT is a vital piece that sets collectors on the path toward their ultimate goal of a fully grown adult duck NFT.
